name: Erato
description:
In a collaborative residency with Print Tv, Zero Likes, Nomade Label, Gus Manute and Blu operate a nomadic image and gift machine, betting on the timelessness of overlays and reprocessing for an effective practice in our digital times. They are inspired by the muses of ancient Greece to compose their intermedia objects: sounds, pixels, midi notes, drawings, noises, grains, and fractals. something between the bits

https://homeostasislab.org/visualizar/obra/1479
